article_title: Why California’s community colleges will soon offer 4-year degrees
article_text:
Skilled career fields increasingly require a higher level of education – an associate’s degree isn’t enough for most employers, especially in health care fields

State’s economy needs a million more graduates with bachelor’s degrees by 2025

Health, manufacturing degrees among those to become available

article_metadata.news-keywords: California, Calif, CA, college, community, bachelor, associate, degree
article_metadata.description: The California Legislature has given the go-ahead for some community colleges to offer bachelor’s degrees on a limited basis. Programs will start in 2017.
article_metadata.title: Why California’s community colleges will soon offer 4-year degrees | The Sacramento Bee
